title: The Shattered Realms: Chronicles of the Eternal Flame
description: An epic fantasy adventure spanning shattered kingdoms, where ancient magic collides with modern ambition.

rooms.name: Waking Village - The Morning After
rooms.description:
You awaken in the smoldering ruins of what was once a peaceful farming village. The air is thick with smoke and the metallic tang of blood. Scattered around you are the remnants of homes, shattered wagons, and the bodies of villagers who never stood a chance.

To the north, a dirt road leads toward the capital city of Eldoria. To the east, dense forest whispers secrets of ancient magic. To the south, the coastal town of Harbor's Rest might offer refuge. Your choice will shape the fate of the Shattered Realms.

rooms.name: Kingsroad to Eldoria
rooms.description: The ancient Kingsroad stretches northward, its cobblestones cracked and overgrown with weeds. Merchant caravans once traveled this route daily, but now only the wind carries tales of the capital. Bandits and worse things are said to roam these lands.

rooms.name: Ancient Forest Entrance
rooms.description: The forest looms before you like a living entity, its ancient trees forming a natural cathedral. Vines as thick as a man's arm twist around trunks older than the kingdoms of men. The air is thick with the scent of moss and magic.

rooms.name: Coastal Road to Harbor's Rest
rooms.description: The coastal road winds southward along dramatic cliffs, offering breathtaking views of the crashing waves below. Seabirds cry overhead, and the salty tang of the ocean fills the air.

rooms.name: Gates of Eldoria - The Wounded Capital
rooms.description: The massive iron gates of Eldoria loom before you, scarred by siege weapons and magical blasts. The walls, once gleaming white marble, are now blackened and cracked. Guards in battered armor stand watch, their eyes hollow from sleepless nights.

rooms.name: Bandit Camp
rooms.description: Tucked away in a small canyon off the Kingsroad, this bandit camp shows signs of recent abandonment. Tents flap in the wind, cooking fires still smolder, and scattered gear suggests a hasty retreat.

rooms.name: Crystal Caves Entrance
rooms.description: The entrance to the Crystal Caves glows with an otherworldly light. Massive crystal formations jut from the earth like frozen lightning. The air hums with contained power.

rooms.name: Gates of Harbor's Rest
rooms.description: Harbor's Rest stands as a beacon of civilization in these dark times. Its walls are sturdy but not oppressive, decorated with seashells and coral.

rooms.name: Eldoria Main Square
rooms.description: The grand square of Eldoria was once a place of celebration and commerce. Now it's a battlefield. Crumbling statues of ancient kings lie toppled, their stone faces cracked.

rooms.name: Oracle's Chamber
rooms.description: You stand in a vast cavern illuminated by a single crystal of pure light, floating at its center. The Oracle herself appears as a being of living crystal, her form shifting between human and elemental.

rooms.name: Harbor's Rest Docks
rooms.description: The docks bustle with activity as sailors, merchants, and travelers from across the known world conduct their business. Ships from distant lands fill the harbor.

rooms.name: Royal Palace Entrance
rooms.description: The grand entrance to the Royal Palace stands defiant against the chaos. Marble columns support a portico adorned with golden eagles. Royal guards stand watch, their faces grim.

rooms.name: Throne Room
rooms.description: The throne room is a cavernous hall of marble and gold, lit by massive crystal chandeliers that cast eerie shadows. The throne itself is empty, but signs of recent occupation are everywhere.

rooms.name: Underground Lair
rooms.description: You descend into darkness, following a hidden passage from the throne room. The air grows thick and foul, carrying the scent of brimstone and decay.

rooms.name: Flame Lord's Chamber
rooms.description: The chamber is vast, its ceiling lost in smoke and shadow. A throne of blackened bones sits at the far end, occupied by a figure wreathed in flames.

items.name: Rusty Dagger
items.description: A weathered blade, dulled by time but still capable of drawing blood.

items.name: Bloodstained Note
items.description: A hastily scribbled note clutched in a villager's hand: 'The shadows came at midnight. They spoke of the Eternal Flame. Find the Oracle in the Crystal Caves.'

items.name: Wild Healing Herb
items.description: A vibrant green plant with restorative properties. Chewing it might help with wounds.

items.name: Abandoned Backpack
items.description: A leather backpack containing travel rations, a map of the region, and 15 gold coins.

items.name: Broken Longsword
items.description: A finely crafted blade, snapped in half during battle. The hilt bears the crest of the Eldorian Royal Guard.

items.name: Glowing Fey Blossom
items.description: A rare flower that blooms only under moonlight. Its petals shimmer with inner light and are said to ward off evil spirits.

items.name: Merchant's Manifest
items.description: A list of goods being transported to Harbor's Rest. Includes exotic spices, fine wines, and mysterious crates marked 'Handle with Care'.

items.name: Bandit Journal
items.description: A leather-bound journal belonging to the bandit leader. It contains notes about the Eternal Flame cult and their plans.

items.name: Royal Proclamation
items.description: An official decree from King Eldric IV, calling all able-bodied citizens to arms against the Eternal Flame. Dated three days ago.

items.name: Crystal of Light
items.description: A fragment of the Oracle's power. It glows with inner light and reveals hidden truths.

items.name: Scroll of Prophecy
items.description: The Oracle's vision of the future, written in glowing runes. It speaks of three paths: Warrior, Mage, and Seeker.

items.name: Tattered Nautical Chart
items.description: A map showing uncharted islands and dangerous currents. One island is marked with a flame symbol.

items.name: Royal Seal of Eldoria
items.description: The king's personal seal, used to authenticate royal decrees. This one bears traces of dark magic.

items.name: Scroll of the Eternal Flame
items.description: A forbidden text describing the ritual to summon the Eternal Flame. Reading it fills your mind with visions of fire and madness.

items.name: Ceremonial Dagger
items.description: A blade etched with flames, still warm from recent use. It hums with contained power.

items.name: Tome of Eternal Fire
items.description: A book bound in dragon hide, containing the secrets of flame magic. Reading it risks madness.

items.name: Crown of Eternal Flame
items.description: The source of the Flame Lord's power. It pulses with destructive energy.

monsters.name: Flame Acolyte
monsters.description: A devoted follower of the Eternal Flame, their body marked with ritual scars and their eyes glowing with fanatic zeal.

monsters.name: Dire Wolf
monsters.description: A massive wolf with glowing red eyes, corrupted by the Cataclysm's dark energies.

monsters.name: Bandit
monsters.description: A desperate outlaw turned to crime by the chaos of the Shattered Realms.

monsters.name: Flame Lord
monsters.description: What was once King Eldric is now a being of pure flame and madness. His form shifts between human and elemental fire, radiating destructive power.
